name: Meteor Defender
description:
Meteor Defender is a clone of the 1980's game Missile Command.  Trying to recreate old arcade games and learn to use Unity and get better at game dev in general. 

A,S,D fire the missile launchers.  when your missile launchers get hit they lose all their missiles but launchers recharge 1 missile every 4 seconds. every time your cities get hit you will lose one score multiplier. the game is over when you lose all your cities.
